subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Atlanta’s Kyle Korver has made at least one 3-pointer in 70 straight games, fourth most in league history. His 45.5 percent accuracy is second in the N.B.A.
snippet: Atlanta’s Kyle Korver has made at least one 3-pointer in 70 straight games, fourth most in league history. His 45.5 percent accuracy is second in the N.B.A.
